channel.title: Boolean on metafunctor
channel.description: Recent content in Boolean on metafunctor

item.title: The Bernoulli Model: A Probabilistic Framework for Data Structures and Types
item.description: This blog post introduces the Bernoulli Model, a framework for understanding probabilistic data structures and incorporating uncertainty into data types, particularly Boolean values. It highlights the model’s utility in optimizing space and accuracy in data representation.
